name: Not again (The Mayday Man)
description:
This is my WOWIE! 3.0 jam game.

You are a marble. You want to die. The universe does not want you to die. Find a way around these rules.

Use WASD or arrow keys to move around. Blue bounces you, purple teleports you, and dark blue is a conveyor belt. Die 10 times to win!

Post your times in the comments.
